titleStmt.title: An exhortation to catechizing: the long neglect whereof is sadly lamented. And the speedy reviving as earnestly desired. / By the provincial assembly at London. August 30. 1655.
titleStmt.author: London (England). Provincial Assembly.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for Samuel Gellibrand at the signe of the Ball in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: With an order to print dated August 30, 1655 and signed: Samuel Balmford Moderator. John Jackson Scriba.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Ball in Pauls Church-yard.
